text: The Staffan Stolle Story () is a 1956 Swedish musical comedy movie directed by Hasse Ekman (who also stars) and starring Povel Ramel, Martin Ljung, Gunwer Bergkvist, Yvonne Lombard. == Other websites == * Category:1956 musical movies Category:1956 comedy movies Category:Swedish musical movies Category:Swedish comedy movies Category:Movies directed by Hasse Ekman
title: The Staffan Stolle Story
